cast.name: 马赫塔卜·塞尔瓦蒂 Mahtab Servati

this_title: At the End of the Day
introduction: The narrative structure of this screenplay includes three episodes that are narrated in parallel and simultaneously in one day, but in this synapse, for simplicity, the stories of these three episodes are written separately.A day in the lives of three young women, each with a ten-years age differencebetween them, who are at different stages in their emotional relationships andare struggling to overcome crises in their relationships.
chinese_title: At the End of the Day
